isis.stitle: TSI 04-12-06R - In-Line Engine Bolt Tightening Torque Updates For Model Years 1993 Through 2003

subjectgroup.subject: In-Line Engine Bolt Tightening Torque Updates For Model Years 1993 Through 2003

configure.engfam: Green Diesel Technology® Engine 1312588 and above

geninfo.para: This bulletin was issued to address a recent bolt torque change and provide some previously missing bolt torque information within the in-line family of diesel engines.

svcsubproc.title: Potential Oil Leak Path at Air Compressor Bolts
svcsubproc.para: Some field engines have exhibited oil leaks from the front cover near the air compressor. Tightening the air compressor mounting bolts using an increased torque value at this location should stop the leakage.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Air compressor mounting bolts to front cover (typical)

item.para: Newly recommended air compressor mounting bolt (M12 x 80) torque is 83 N·m (61 lbf·ft).

svcsubproc.title: Power Steering Bolt Torque
svcsubproc.para: Torque values for the power steering mounting bolts were not published in the EGES-105 and EGES-210 service manual.

item.para: For engines with an air compressor, torque power steering mounting bolts (M10 x 35) to 61 N·m (45 lbf·ft).
For engines without an air compressor, torque power steering mounting bolts (M12 x 90) to 83 N·m (61 lbf·ft).

svcsubproc.title: Engine Lifting Eye Bolt Torque
svcsubproc.para: Torque values for the rear lifting eye hex-flange bolts (M14 x 30) were not published in the EGES-210 Standard Torque Table.

item.para: The rear lifting eye hex-flange bolt (M14 x 30) should be torqued to 172 N·m (127 lbf·ft).
